citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC has not conducted a review of the program for humane care and use of animals at least once every six
months. This semi-annual program review is important to assist the IACUC in its evaluation and oversight of proper care
and welfare of the animals utilized at the institution. The IACUC must review, at least once every six months, the facility's
program for humane care and use of animals to assure proper care and welfare of animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(1)  Repeat
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC has not conducted a review of the program for humane care and use of animals at least once every six 
months. This semi-annual program review is important to assist the IACUC in its evaluation and oversight of proper care 
and welfare of the animals utilized at the institution. The IACUC must review, at least once every six months, the facility's 
program for humane care and use of animals to assure proper care and welfare of animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian.
